name: Polymers composed of a 50-60 weight-percent ethyl acrylate
36-40 weight-percent methacrylic acid
C<sub>16-18</sub>-alkyl ethers
C<sub>12-14</sub>-alkyl ethers
FoodContactSubstance: Polymers composed of a 50-60 weight-percent ethyl acrylate (CAS Reg. No. 140-88-5), 36-40 weight-percent methacrylic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-41-4), and up to 10 weight-percent mixture of poly(oxy-1,3-ethanediyl), α-(2-methyl-1-oxo-2-propen-1-yl)-ω-hydoxy-, C<sub>16-18</sub>-alkyl ethers (CAS Reg. No. 70879-51-5) and/or poly(oxy-1,3-ethanediyl), α-(2-methyl-1-oxo-2-propen-1-yl)-ω-hydoxy-, C<sub>12-14</sub>-alkyl ethers (CAS Reg. No. 72275-82-2).
